mapper.update:
update web_urlvouchercollection
activityname = #{activityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dailylimit = #{dailylimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frequencylimit = #{frequencylimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ruletext = #{ruletext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code1 = #{code1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code2 = #{code2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
